content: die anleitung ist nur für das muster und das bündchen ferse und spitze können nach belieben gestrickt werden viel spaß mit der anleitung since i had some questions about an english version of the pattern i made a short translation of the pattern i hope that you can cope with it because my english is not so good the translation is included in the instructions instructions are for the pattern and the cuff only heel and toe can be knitted however you like have fun with the instructions
